metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15574 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, stored XSS is possible by using an SVG document as an attachment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.4.2-1
redmine-mysql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-1').
